articles.author: Raja Abdulrahim
articles.title: Iran-Backed Fighters Switch to Syrian Uniforms to Avoid Israeli Strikes, Rebels Say
articles.description: The Syrian regime is disguising Iran-allied militias as its own fighters, according to rebels, a battlefield feint that appears calculated to try to avoid further Israeli air strikes.

articles.author: Jeremy Barr
articles.title: Fox News' Charles Krauthammer Reveals He Has Weeks to Live
articles.description: Fox News contributor Charles Krauthammer announced in a letter that his cancer has returned.
